endpoints.name: Get all campaigns

queryParameters.name: Fields
queryParameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

queryParameters.name: Exclude Fields
queryParameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

queryParameters.name: Campaign Type
queryParameters.description: The campaign type. Possible Values: regular, plaintext, absplit, rss, variate.

queryParameters.name: Status
queryParameters.description: The status of the campaign. Possible Values: save, paused, schedule, sending, sent.

queryParameters.name: Before Send Time
queryParameters.description: Restrict the response to campaigns sent before the set time. We recommend ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

queryParameters.name: Since Send Time
queryParameters.description: Restrict the response to campaigns sent after the set time. We recommend ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

queryParameters.name: Before Create Time
queryParameters.description: Restrict the response to campaigns created before the set time. We recommend ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

queryParameters.name: Since Create Time
queryParameters.description: Restrict the response to campaigns created after the set time. We recommend ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

queryParameters.name: List ID
queryParameters.description: The unique id for the list.

queryParameters.name: Folder ID
queryParameters.description: The unique folder id.

queryParameters.name: Sort By Field
queryParameters.description: Returns files sorted by the specified field. Possible Values: create_time, send_time.

queryParameters.name: Sort Direction
queryParameters.description: Determines the order direction for sorted results. Possible Values: ASC, DESC.

queryParameters.name: Since Date Created
queryParameters.description: Restrict results to lists created after the set date. We recommend ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

queryParameters.description: Restrict results to lists created before the last campaign send date. We recommend ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

queryParameters.name: Subscriber Email

queryParameters.description: Returns files sorted by the specified field. Possible Values: date_created.

queryParameters.description: Determines the order direction for sorted results. Possible Values: ASC, DES.

endpoints.name: Members : Get information about members in a list

pathParameters.name: List ID
pathParameters.description: The unique id for the list.

queryParameters.name: Fields
queryParameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

queryParameters.name: Exclude Fields
queryParameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

queryParameters.name: Email Type
queryParameters.description: The email type.

queryParameters.name: Subscriber Status
queryParameters.description: The subscriber’s status.

queryParameters.name: Since Timestamp Opt
queryParameters.description: Restrict results to subscribers who opted-in after the set timeframe. We recommend ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

queryParameters.name: Before Timestamp Opt
queryParameters.description: Restrict results to subscribers who opted-in before the set timeframe. We recommend ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

queryParameters.name: Since Last Changed
queryParameters.description: Restrict results to subscribers whose information changed after the set timeframe. We recommend ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

queryParameters.name: Before Last Changed
queryParameters.description: Restrict results to subscribers whose information changed before the set timeframe. We recommend ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

queryParameters.name: Unique Email ID
queryParameters.description: A unique identifier for the email address across all Mailchimp lists. This parameter can be found in any links with Ecommerce Tracking enabled.

queryParameters.name: VIP Only
queryParameters.description: A filter to return only the list’s VIP members. Passing true will restrict results to VIP list members, passing false will return all list members.

queryParameters.name: Interest Category ID
queryParameters.description: The unique id for the interest category.

queryParameters.name: Interest Ids
queryParameters.description: Used to filter list members by interests. Must be accompanied by interest_category_id and interest_match. The value must be a comma separated list of interest ids present for any supplied interest categories.

queryParameters.name: Interest Match
queryParameters.description: Used to filter list members by interests. Must be accompanied by interest_category_id and interest_ids. “any” will match a member with any of the interest supplied, “all” will only match members with every interest supplied, and “none” will match members without any of the interest supplied. Possible Values: any, all, none

queryParameters.name: Sort By Field
queryParameters.description: Returns files sorted by the specified field. Possible Values: timestamp_opt, timestamp_signup.

queryParameters.name: Sort Direction
queryParameters.description: Determines the order direction for sorted results. Possible Values: ASC,DESC

queryParameters.name: Since Last Campaign
queryParameters.description: Filter subscribers by those subscribed/unsubscribed/pending/cleaned since last email campaign send. Member status is required to use this filter.

queryParameters.name: Unsubscribed Since
queryParameters.description: Filter subscribers by those unsubscribed since a specific date. Using any status other than unsubscribed with this filter will result in an error.
